SENT.plain: A 36-year-old male with Marfan syndrome succesfully underwent Bentall operation and aortic arch replacement using a stent graft as an elephant trunk
He had received MVR with sternum turn over 14 years previously
Under circulatory arrest with rertograde cerebral perfusion we performed Bentall operation and aortic arch replacement using a stent graft
This surgical procedure was effective for cardiovascular disease with Marfan syndrome
